website_summaries.verdict: The soft, cocoon-like construction of this bed adds comfort and security.
pros: Deep, moldable sides are great for dogs who like to burrow and readjust bedding until it's just-so
Made of self-warming materials and designed to provide orthopedic support
cons: Some owners feel the sides are a bit too floppy

customer_reviews.title: Great little bed!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 lb Chihuahua, Ricky, has forgotten about all the other choices of beds in the house after this bed entered the scene! He's in it as I write this. When you first take it out of the bag, it is new of course so it's pretty fluffy, your pet may tumble over a little bit until it stabilizes and takes to his/her shape. After that, you're golden. It's soft, deep and dark, just like they want it! You should get it, in fact, get two, so you don't have to keep taking it to one room to another all the time like I do. I'm ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: pawesomegirl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have a 'slightly' overweight pug who's aging and getting arthritis, so I wanted to get him something that's supportive to lay on. He has loved this from the moment he sat on it! I have to take it from room to room for him!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and snug!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Best doggie bed I've ever owned. My dogs absolutely adore it, they seem to feel extra cozy and snug in it.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia G.

customer_reviews.title: My animals love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried my dog wouldn't like this bed but she loves it!! Super soft and deep. The cat likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Bummed :-(
customer_reviews.text: The photos for this item are completely misleading. I thought I was buying a Sherpa ball dog bed but all this is is a cuddle bed with higher sides. It falls over & wont stand up on its own. A complete disappointment. The fuchsia color is cute but that's the best thing I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsie the Owl

customer_reviews.title: DOG TACO
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this from the minute he saw it. It's perfect for little dogs who love to feel secure and snuggled in
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: So cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cozy bed, my Frenchie immediately took a nap in it when it arrived! =) I was worried about it being too small since he is around 27 lbs. but he fit just great and with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs enjoy the bed, and that mainly what matters. Look at the products picture as you would a burger on a commercial. It looks perfect, but what you actually get is something that is the same product, but a lesser version. My bed never poofed like the display photo. The part of the edge that's higher ended up just falling backwards. After about a month of use, I found that there was a hole on the bottom side stitching, which is kind of upsetting. If a product is made for dogs, it needs to be durable. My boys didn't use it for anything besides sleeping, so there wasn't any rough play or ripping it up.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: The best dog bed for your small pup
customer_reviews.text: My pound pups LOVE this pink poof. Here is Mitzi - she weighs 21 pounds - and drags it around the house until she finds where she wants to lie down - then pops herself into it. Both our pups love it, but this one is particularly attached to it. Too bad the price jumped to over the moon!! We paid about $17.50 each here on AMZ. Best decision we ever made was to go to the pound and bring home our 2 fur babies. So affectionate and appreciative of every little thing we do for them. If you haven't considered it yet, do it! You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Knickerbocker

customer_reviews.title: my dogs all time favorite bed
customer_reviews.text: My two chihuahuas cuddle all day in this bed since day one. The turquoise color is beautiful! Super soft and plush. Stick it in the washing machine and dryer with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased bed mid-October. Within a week the bed had lost its shape, though the cats continued to use it. Today I put it in the washing machine using the delicates cycle, as per the care tag instructions, and when it came out the bed had split apart at the seams. I have purchased much cheaper cat beds from Walmart that have held up to a single washing. For the price, would have expected it to last longer than two months. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Instant favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I draped my cats favorite fleece blanket over this and it was an instant success. It is super fluffy and great for kneading - at least, my cat seems to think so! He even hangs over the edge sometimes like the pictures here. Definitely suggest it if you've got a cat that doesn't quite sleep in your bed, but does sleep nearby. Update: I've even started moving it around the house to him, and he doesn't need the blanket anymore now. He just loves it outright.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the medium size and it's itty bitty tiny. My 30lb beagle is definitely a medium size dog but apparently this company considers her to be a large dog in need of a "large" bed. If it was just a little smaller it could be used as one of those russian hats if turned upside down. Would have been nice if their sizing was in line with the rest of the pet world. In the end I have purchased a different bed and will eat the cost of this waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: NotLazyNotBusy

customer_reviews.title: Meh... I guess these will do.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs seem to like the beds but they liked their previous beds also. I will agree that these beds are floppy and don't hold their shape well or rarely stay upright. One stays upright for the most part and the other just folds over like a taco. A couple times the dogs have just given up and laid on top of the taco, lol. We really liked our old dog beds but they finally pooped out on us after 4 years so I guess these will do.
customer_reviews.author: Marsden

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was going to love this bed for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to love this bed for the dogs...unfortunately the first bed was not sewn properly in the part where they would lay and Amazon replaced it only for the second one to come apart at the bottom. So with that said...the dogs loved it for about 3 weeks. This item is very poorly made and it was a complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Iggygal

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs-up from my cats!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it took 3 1/2 weeks to get one of my cats in, but I knew as soon as they tried it they would love it! I did give it a spray with catnip a couple of times to help encourage them. The second time did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: JNell

customer_reviews.title: Collapses easily
customer_reviews.text: This bed is more likely for a small cat or ferret but it does not work for a 12ibs dog. As soon my dog tries to lie in this bed the bed tips forward and kind of collapses. The actual space to lie on it, is very small, so my Yorkie has no place in that thing. That design reminds me of a partial open shell, it isn't very usable for my dog which is unfortunate since it was not so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Both my Yorkies love this and it is super soft
customer_reviews.text: Both my Yorkies love this and it is super soft. Great for carrying for car rides too. Haven't had to wash it yet, but seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loved it instantly
customer_reviews.text: I pulled this out of the box and for once, the kitten wanted the product more than the box! She climbed in and started kneading the bed, purring super loud! I bought two, one for upstairs and one for downstairs, because she follows me around and now always has somewhere warm to lay. She’s only 6lbs now and has tons of room to grow into these! Great product!!! Haven’t washed it yet, I’ll update the review when I have.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable my tush!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this on time and my 4month old pug Duke dropped his pillow for this comfy bed. He loved it,.. Til I had to wash it because on an accident he had. I followed the instructions to the "t" and washed it alone as you can see in the images, pictures speaks for themselves. When I went to take it out of my washer much to my surprise there was a pillow fight and I wasn't invited!! Jokes aside it wasn't fun to fish out the stuffing from washer. You can draw your own conclusions.
customer_reviews.author: Eva B.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love this deep dish bed! When one leaves, another one jumps in their place! I'm attaching a picture of one of my dogs who is too big for the bed, but he doesn't seem to care! HAHA I've washed it a couple of times already and it has washed up very nicely! I definitely recommend this bed to dogs of all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: DogMom

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT hold it's shape
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this doggy bed. It does not hold it's shape. It tends to collapse on itself and folds in on itself like a taco. I tried washing and drying it with hopes that it would stiffen and plump up, but that didn't work. The overall structure of this bed is weak and my dog doesn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: The bed is a very sweet pink color but I'm sad I had to pay ...
customer_reviews.text: The bed is a very sweet pink color but I'm sad I had to pay an extra ten dollars to get the pink instead of beige... My dog doesn't particularly like it but she looks very sweet when she does sleep in it. She's 3.5 lbs but has a long body because she's part dachshund, see pic for reference! I reckon the bed would work well for any up to 15 lbs. She also recently started using the sides for some "exercise". I guess they're just the right height for her... She's been "exercising" almost daily with this bed for around 2 weeks now...
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: This is a clamshell-like bed which seems to clamp the cats shut
customer_reviews.text: Very plush and attractive, no doubt. I love the chocolate and sherpa style and textures. However, it has a near-fatal flaw. The pet-bed ships in a tight plastic bag and the bed is folded over top to bottom. This bed has kept the clamshell shape now a week and will not open into a full bed but rather acts like a clam. When the cats climb in, the top folds partially over the animal and freaks them out. Pretty much useless unless I can open the folding somehow. Cats are not to be fooled twice; they ignore it.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm GrangerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product! Dog Falls right to sleep in this bed!
customer_reviews.text: My French bulldog is 25 pounds & the standard size bed is a little too small for him. However, the product is amazing and I’m going to give this to a friend with a smaller dog. I wished “Best Friends” made this exact one in the Jumbo Size. I already have a jumbo size in a different color and my dog loves it. I’m Ordering a new Jumbo size because the old one is starting to look a little shabby but we have had it for a long time. Washes great, durable and super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mailei

customer_reviews.title: My cat sleeps in it all dat:)
customer_reviews.text: My cat falling love with her new cat bed immediately. She refuse to leave this bed after she find how comfortable it is. Really soft and well made. I think it might be a little big for my cat. Overall. I think it is a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Randomforest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 month old puppy loves this bed sooo much!! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the cat wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost sorry we got it. She rarely sits with us on the sofa anymore. We were worried she wouldn't be able to snuggle up in it as much as she likes to- tight in a ball in a corner. But she can. She also can spread out and hang off it. It seems she finds a new way to sleep on it every day. Its her favorite thing and I'm planning on buying another for upstairs/when this one is in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: DSW

customer_reviews.title: the most favorite bed to have ever entered my home
customer_reviews.text: Oh this bed!! Hands down, the most favorite bed to have ever entered my home!!! It is a constant fight between two of my pups to who gets to lay in this bed every day. And when one does, it's an all day thing to not let it go! Haha! I'm on here purchasing the second! Yesterday I tried bribing one of my dogs to come out of it and he just gave me major side eye like, you're not fooling me Mom! Def recommended this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Hurtarte

customer_reviews.title: All my dogs LOVE this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I need to buy a second one when they're in stock. As soon as one dog gets out of it, another one hops in. This bed is made of soft fabric and super cushy. It isn't incredibly structural, but that seems like a strength - my dogs enjoy kneading it and folding up the walls to get comfortable. It's a little smaller than the product photo might suggest, but big enough for my <30lb Boston Terriers to curl up comfortably for an hour or two every day. I haven't tried washing it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Review_homies

customer_reviews.title: A picture's worth a 1000 words
customer_reviews.text: My cat Charlie recently turned 20! I have bought him at least a half dozen cat beds over the years and he's NEVER taken to any of them. EVER. (Ditto cat toys.) But I took a chance on this cat bed because it was billed as "orthopedic" and because he loves to curl up in a circle to sleep and because it looked SO COZY. It took a few days for him to try it out (and a sprinkling of catnip!) but now it's his favorite place to sleep! I may buy another one so Charlie has a cozy spot on each floor of the house!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Q

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet bed
customer_reviews.text: My Pug loves this bed! It fits a small dog perfectly, it has one high side that is not shown in the photo, which the dog can lay on if she stretches out. My dog can roll over and around and the bed shifts with her. This bed is really soft and well made. The bottom is thick and fluffy. It is easy to pop into the washer too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fat cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this and 3 other varieties of beds for my friends cat. Less than 5 minutes out of the box my cat had claimed this. I know this isn't how it's designed but she also likes it when I flip it over ...so the back is on the ground and kinda like a cave. Needless to say. My friends cat isn't getting this bed. I wish they came people size.
customer_reviews.author: ChristMae

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRT BED EVER.......BUT
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for my 7 dogs. They loved the bed, but when the factory started shipping them rolled up in a plastic bag, with all the air taken out. Now the beds have lost it's shape. It won't hold it shape, folds in half and the dogs can't get in it. Before they were just shipping it in a box with out it being rolled up with all of the air taken out.. I suggest not shipping this way, it ruins the bed.
customer_reviews.author: muskynae

customer_reviews.title: My dogs (all under 10lbs) all love this bed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs (all under 10lbs) all love this bed!! It's rarely empty and my mean ass chihuahua that no one challenges finally had enough and claimed it as his so now I need to buy another one for the other dogs! I love that it keeps it's shape despite how my dogs lay on it. It was even tested by my dad's overweight dachshund who didn't fit into it so he just laid right on top flattening it and the bed still bounced back into its original shape
customer_reviews.author: Goofy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small dog!
customer_reviews.text: My shih tzu/terrier mix dog loves this bed!! He slept in it last night and has been in it all day. He weighs about 13lbs and fills it up. My larger shih tzu is 20lb and would not fit. My dog curls up in this and feels safe and warm. The sides are perfect to give him that cave-like feeling that he previously got by sleeping under my bed or snuggled up to me. Thinking of buying another to have one in each floor of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Fischer

customer_reviews.title: No Sale for my Pets
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this bed a positive review as I had high hopes for our aged kitty (18+ years) who loves to get IN boxes, etc. Thought he would love this bed. Neither cat nor our small dog will have anything to do with this bed. I've even resorted to using a lot of catnip spray which they LOVE; then once I realized the cats were going to have nothing to do with it, I tried to sell it to our small dog by way of numerous treats and profuse praise. She will have no part of it either. Total waste of money for me, so obviously they don't all LOVE this pet bed.
customer_reviews.author: Colene

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t review items often, I bought this bed for my senior cat who has arthritis now. As soon as I opened the package and took out the bed, my cat walked right into it. Without being prompted! As soon as they laid down, I knew this was the right pick for my cat. It’s the perfect size for him. Here’s a photo of him enjoying it the first night. Haven’t washed it yet and I received it today, so I can’t speak to the durability and washing of this product yet. I will update my review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: gma

customer_reviews.title: Great cozy cuddler
customer_reviews.text: My dog is obsessed with this cuddler. At first we thought it might be too small for him. He is 20lbs but long. It is slightly too small for him but that may be the appeal. Since it is winter, he has been curled up in that bed constantly and loves that he can rest his head on the built up walls. We loved the beige color too and it looks great given his coloring so we don't see his fur all over it. We just wish it was slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Thakor

customer_reviews.title: Walter Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky 9 year old schnauzer- this was a winner of a bed for him, instant satisfaction! I’ve purchased quite a few (10+) dog beds and this one is truly of great quality, comfort and quality. I haven’t needed to clean it- but looks easy enough. The bottom panel is made of durable fabric and it’s overstuffed for comfort and wear. I’ll be ordering again when the time comes!
customer_reviews.author: Snowfish

customer_reviews.title: Another comfy bed my girls love.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is another big hit for my girls. They take turns switching between this bed & the regular round cuddler bed. They make biscuits when they get in before snuggling down, I've even seen them "toe massaging" the sides of it after they are cuddled down. Very soft & cozy feeling, makes me wish I could have one for myself. I haven't had to was this one yet either so I don't know how well it will handle machine washing. I recommend this bed for pets who like to cuddle down in their beds.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Russell

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Approved
customer_reviews.text: My puppy immediately took to this bed and curled right up. The sides are really cushy, and the inner material is nice and soft, like one of those sherpa blankets. I've had this for a year now, and even though I thought my dog had outgrown it, I still find her curled up in it sometimes. Haven't had any problems with it in all that time, though my dog isn't the type to tear things up, so your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My chiweenie is in love with this bed. She loves to snuggle under blankets and arrange them exactly how she wants. This bed is perfect for that and it's fuzzy and cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Cat Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this new cat bed home for our outside kitty & he warmed right up to it! I was super surprised! Animals can be weird about new beds but not this time. Once he climbed into it, he did not want to climb out of it. He is a larger cat so I wasn't sure how it would fit for him, but it's perfect! The inside material is extremely soft. It looks like it's sturdy and made well. We will see once its time to wash it. Tossed a few of the cat toys in the bed & cat was in there sleeping away! I just may buy another! I'm impressed...the cat is obviously impressed....fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fluffy, but has a problem...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is a cute color and it's so fluffy and soft, plus it has a great shape that my dog likes to sleep in. BUT! It had a very weird smell when I opened it and that hasn't seemed to go away (had it for about a month). Because of that (I believe), my dog seems to be avoiding it. She will literally lay and sleep on anything (pile of towels, dirty clothes, folded blankets, in baskets, etc.) and even with this bed laying in prime spots, she just... doesn't use it. I really do think it's because of this weird smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C.

customer_reviews.title: For our Jack Russell
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a new bed for your doggy, it either accepts or totally rejects it. With the coming winter, our Jack Russell needed something cozier that she could snuggle into because she gets cold so easily. I liked that this has a bit of a pocket interior... and so did our Rosie. She hopped in and then promptly laid down for her afternoon nap.
customer_reviews.author: Romantic

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The bed is not waterproof as advertised. My geriatric cat with health issues sometimes wets the bed and the urine runs right through to the floor. Washing the bed is a bit challenging if your top load washer has a spindle in the center. Front load would be much easier. Drying on low heat takes 3-4 cycles as bed is thick and instructions are to dry completely. Be mindful of small pets that want to stretch out. My 7 1/2# cat can't comfortably curl for long and the walls are too thick and firm for her to push down for more space.
customer_reviews.author: Izewide Open

customer_reviews.title: Nugget loves it
customer_reviews.text: Ok I initially did not like the bed because yes it wouldn’t sit up properly and just turned into a little taco. But it didn’t mater because my dog loves it. Plus I put a heavy blanket on it which I personally think improves the look of it, and now that he spends so much time snuggled in it he’s flattened out the bottom and it mostly stands up on its own just fine. My only annoyance is I ran it through the washer and it still had some crud that didn’t come off but with the blanket I don’t notice it much.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves this bed!!
customer_reviews.text: After ignoring this bed for several months, one of my three cats has discovered that it is his comfort zone. Every morning he begs for us to get our cup of coffee and sit next to the bed so he can settle in. He is in another world when he settles down in this bed. He does "happy feet" and goes almost into a trance! I can't say enough about the fact that it provides my cat a more secure and comfortable sleeping environment than any other pet beds I ever bought! I have not washed it yet. It is so plush and feels comforting to my touch, it's no wonder it's become his best, secret place!
customer_reviews.author: 4goodmusic

customer_reviews.title: Great snuggle bed
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say that this is a great bed. Not the sturdiest but it's not supposed to be, it's cuddly. My pup loves it. She's a 7 pound chihuahua/corgi and she fits perfectly. A bigger dog could easily fit. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Cute, Perfect Size; Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 beds for our pup so there's a backup bed when one gets washed. I like to wash things and sometimes don't move items to the dryer quickly enough for bed time! Our dog is NOT a destroyer and has never chewed up a bed or toy other than bones. She used this bed 2 nights and had stuffing everywhere. I repaired it, washed it, and tried it out for the cat and she has no interest. I am hoping the repair holds up and donating the bed. If your dog chews bed, I can't recommend this one. If they are not destructive, it is a great bed.
customer_reviews.author: momma&fam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Tatl Tail loves this thing. It’s sitting in a window and she can either watch her youngest human play video games or watch the construction going on across the street. It did not need the extra blanket, but this is is her blankey and smells like home (we just moved) so I stuck it in the bottom to make her feel more at home here. She kneads and bites this bed all the time. So she apparently loves the fabric. This is pretty much where she stays when she isn’t behaving like a wolf cat.
customer_reviews.author: Toni L.C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly sewn
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY looked forward to this bed for my older cat. I put it in the dryer on delicate/low heat to fluff it up as directed before she tried it. The seams were very poorly sewn, split open, and now the filling is totally exposed, so obviously she won’t be able to use it. I’m very disappointed in the quality of the sewing of this bed. That’s too bad because it is very soft and looks like my cat would have loved it. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Picture purrrfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my smaller kitten. None of them were interested even with bribes of treats. Then exactly a week later my larger cat started sleeping in it by herself. Mind you, we have over 9 beds to select from so I'm happy it's getting used.
customer_reviews.author: Florabama

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Beyond Belief
customer_reviews.text: Sure the thing's expensive. So what? You get what you pay for. And in this case, you get sleeping luxury like never before imagined. I placed my most hyper cat in the thing and she was hooked immediately. Never even thought of leaving it. Plush padding, an alpaca wool-like bedding. A couple things to know: I wouldn't recommend it for anything bigger than a cat. My larger cats will fill out the whole thing. Second, this thing will retain heat. I use it outdoors on a porch. My cats will have no problem even in 20 degree weather. Indoors w/a temperature in the 70's, the thing might get a little too warm for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Dog Pods
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for our smaller (12lb) mutt for Christmas. Our 21lb beagle mix loved it so much we bought another. We keep them on the sofa and the dogs are in them 90% of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My Little Dog Loves This Bed!
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is wonderfully soft and the high sides suit a dog who likes to curl up and snuggle down into his bed. I bought this bed and another warming fleece bed, to give my dog a choice of sleeping arrangements. He much prefers this soft little bed. I have washed it and dried it already and it still looks new. It seems to be well worth the price, as my dog spends hours in it. I'm glad that Amazon offers such a wide selection of pet products and I don't have to drive to a store!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Mason in NC

customer_reviews.title: Not warming beds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of the Sheri OrthoComfort Deep Dish Cuddlers for my cats because the description on the Amazon site stated that they were self warming. I have purchased self warming beds and cushions before, so I did not hesitate to purchase these bed. However, when I received them there wasn't any indication on the description tags to state that they were self warming. I would like to see the advertised description changed, and have the self warming deleted as it is very misleading. There is nothing in these cushions that would reflect heat back to the animal, and therefore, make them self warming,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's very soft but I thought it was going to be a different material meaning I thought it would be fluffier and softer. It is very nice but the back is very tall and it stays flopped over due to packing or not I don't know my dog will sit in and and it will not collapse on him but as soon as he's out the back will flop down
customer_reviews.author: Atkinskid

customer_reviews.title: Mojo's favorite deep dish
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty absolutely loves this bed. At first, she was hesitant to give up her old, ratty $5 bed, but with a little cat nip and a little patience she finally realized how amazing this bed is. She loves leaning her head on the sides, and the deepness of it allows her to snuggle inside of it really well. The material is a nice, soft, plush material. Would definitely buy again in the future once it gets old and ratty from her sleeping in it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Soft, and Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Our little buddy LOVES this bed! It's our third style from this brand, we also have the donut with the semi-circle blanket and the throne. The Deep Dish Cuddler offers multiple angles for lounging and effectively soothes a stressed baby when the vacuum comes out <3 Our boy is a taller than average, 27lb Frenchie, and we order Jumbos because he likes to stretch out and lay on his side. If your pup's size hovers in the middle of the two sizes, consider whether they like to curl up or stretch out. If they like to stretch, size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased a lot of cat beds in our day. This one is really plush and lovely BUT with design flaw. They fold it in half to ship it, and you can never flatten it back out, so it ends up acting more like a taco, than a bed. None of our cats will get anywhere near it because when they do, the back half folds down and forward. We have tried laying it upside down, inside out, many things to try to combat this issue. Complete and utter waste of money. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: KellyG

customer_reviews.title: 4 star
customer_reviews.text: So the reason this is not a 5 star is because it does not hold its shape as good as I would like it too and because my dog is within the weight for the bed size or him, but I think he is just a little to big for the weight size matching of this bed. I must also state with that he is part wiener dog so he is longer than average dog of his weight. I do also with that the bottom of it had more stuffing for comfort of my dog. So good stuff about it is my dog loves it. It’s beautiful and does not take up a lot of space which I like! I
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Elser

customer_reviews.title: best dog bed ever.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves his bed so much that he sleeps half in it and half out of it! LOL no but really he loves this bed. It's so soft and cuddly. It adjusts to the way he sleeps on it. I think its easy to wash. I just put it in the laundry with all his toys, blanket, and towels and it washes fine. It also fluffs right back up. After I was it my dog plays around with it a bit to get it the way he wants it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Manifa S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean if your dog is poopy
customer_reviews.text: Our new puppy (11 weeks) dookied and tinkled all over her crate for awhile. But she also needed a snuggly item in there to comfort her because she was scared. This thing fit the bill, is soft and cuddlesome, plus it washes up extremely well. The only vague complaint is that the shape is a bit odd. It does fit pretty well inside the crate but nowhere else. The back of the pillow bit is just sort of lumpish. Not a terrible feature, but not too helpful either.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: As soon as we opened up the box that was packaged nicely, she jumped right into the bed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to give this to my dog for Christmas but I just couldn’t wait. As soon as we opened up the box that was packaged nicely, she jumped right into the bed. It was the perfect size for her. She’s a small/medium beagle/mini greyhound mix. The fabric is soft and the bed is padded nicely for your dogs comfort. I’ll update review if there is anything concerning. So far, shipping was fast and it was packaged nicely. Would buy again from vendor as long as there is no issues but seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfy dog bed. I bought the Jumbo for my 13 pound puppy because she likes to stretch out occasionally and hangs over her other bed. This one replaces her crate because she suddenly wouldn't go in it at 7 months, even with the door open. I was worried that it would take a couple of weeks to warm up to the new bed like the last one but she jumped in the minute I unpacked it! It's a pretty soft aqua color. The cushion inside is not attached for easy washing and she loves to "nest " before she goes to sleep. Well made, seams strong. Great bed!
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this, but has easily trashed it. It refuses to stay open.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this very long & while my dog loves to sleep on it, he also pulls on the fabric which is kind of a shag. It looks like it's 10 years old. It doesn't bother my dog, but I have to hide it when company comes over. I gave it only 3 stars because it will not stay upright. I have to lean it against something to keep it open at all. It's always folded over, so my dog climbs up on top and lays on it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cuddly pink bed
customer_reviews.text: My little rescue mutt is all black and sometimes hard to see, so I've been buying a lot of pink to make her easy to spot. She seems to like it and it's easy to pick her up and move her in it. Super cute, I do recommend it. 4 stars only as the price at $29 was a touch high.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: My cats are obsessed!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my gals for Christmas and they both love it so much, that I had to order another! :) It is so soft and squishy. When I unwrapped it, my 8 month old (Ygritte) immediately hopped in and started making biscuits. My 2 year old (Peppercorn) took a little more time to warm up to it, but after a couple hours of checking it out, she hopped in and loves it now too. Ygritte is so comfortable in it, that I can scoop up the bed with her in it and she doesn't even care. :) I bought the standard size and it's perfect for both my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Evans

customer_reviews.title: TheWonderfulWallyWill likes it a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this bed (small) up for my 5 lb floofy fluffy Pomeranian. I bought it as a car seat for him. A nice bed with high sides that I could put in the seat and string his seat belt through. This bed is fantastic! It's squishy and big enough for him to settle in and settle down. It appears to be very good quality as well. I've attached a couple pictures so you can see how much space there is. The first view is from the front.. it is a deep bed! I'm now thinking about replacing a couple of his other beds and buying it as gifts for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One dog wasn't a fan, the other was obsessed but too big for it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed for my Aunt's small dog, but he wasn't interested in it at all. His brother, however, who is a much larger dog, wanted to fit in this bed so badly that it almost hurt to watch him try so hard to cuddle up in it and fail so miserably. The bed is really soft and pillow-y, the fabric is plush, and the sides have enough substance to them that they're actually supportive and hold their shape. I had hoped to order the jumbo size bed in this style, but Amazon either didn't carry it or didn't have it in stock at the time. I'll look again when his current bed is due for a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: ACTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Cat's Meow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly cat who often seems to be chilled and uncomfortable. The bed comes sealed in plastic and immediately fluffs up into shape once removed from the plastic. It is extremely soft and has a smooth bottom. There is no shedding of the fabric at all. OK bottom line you know how finicky cats can be and how they immediately know if something has changed in their domain. My cat went and checked it out and as soon as I put a couple of treats in it to attract his attention, it became his new lounge area.
customer_reviews.author: Mackman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My pug puppy lives for this bed. It's seriously his everything. When I first got him and he was so small the bed would overwhelm him he would flip it upside down and lay on top of it. Now he almost fills the whole thing and loves it so much. I keep it in his playpen with him when I leave and he sleeps in it or plays around with it. I will definitely be repurchasing this if he ever tears it apart!!
customer_reviews.author: howlingcommando

customer_reviews.title: cats favorite bed
customer_reviews.text: this is now my cats favorite place to sleep, I've purchased several for her in the past and she's always liked using them but this one is her favorite, we find her in it constantly its stretched out slightly so now its wraps around her when she stretches out in it and sleeps
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: My kitten LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: My kitten started sleeping in this bed the day he came home. For a while at the beginning he was chewing on the sides and tore a couple of holes in it, but still...it's his, he loves it. He sleeps in it every night and during the day, unfortunately he has vomited in it and I haven't washed it because of the holes. I'm thinking about getting him another one because he loves it so much...but then it won't have his smells in it (even though it smells like his vomit - yuk). Anyway, I call this a winner and would recommend it to anyone who asks.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Dreams Are Made of This
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Standard size bed in Beige Sherpa for our mature cat because we wanted to reclaim our couches. So far so good. I was pleasantly surprised at how fast our cat took to this bed. She seemed to always be searching for a comfy warm spot and now she finally has it. The Sherpa material is soft but know that it will snag if your pets have long claws (which our older cat kinda does). For the price and quality, we’d recommend giving this bed a try.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about this bed
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this bed!!!! I bought this for my brand new puppy. We've had her (and the bed) since July. She likes to dig in this and bury her chew toys. She's chewed on it/dragged it around. We've even had to wash it a few times because of fleas. And after 3.5 months of all that - it still looks and feels like new! Our dog is a Japanese Spitz, and at 5.5 months, this bed has grown so well with her - I truly hope she never outgrows it!
customer_reviews.author: Heel Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Pug approved
customer_reviews.text: Over the summer I adopted a sweet 5 year old pug. I had so many things to buy in a short amount of time! I picked these bed as it had great reviews and was affordable. After a few days, my pug learned to enjoy it. She likes to rest her head on the side. But she only uses it when im working on projects or cooking. Otherwise she's by my side :) I was able to wash this in a normal, older model washing machine. It did take some time to dry and doesn't quite look good as new. But this bed still functions just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Antonea PayanTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: What A POS
customer_reviews.text: There is no padding inside of it! It's just a very thin plastic. I bought the Jumbo size and it's just plastic with furry stuff around the perimeter. And it flops right over. Absolutely horrible! I'm returning it ASAP. Thing costs 45.58 plus tax. You'd think they'd manage to send a complete bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ammazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is an all around hit at my house full of animals. There is almost always one of them in it. If I pick the bed up and put it back down, they will run to be the first on it. So far it is staying pretty clean somehow and I have not yet had to wash this one. It does not shed like the other brand of bed I recently purchased that is in the same price range. I also like that the bed has a kind of a lip on one side that is taller, which the animals seem to snuggle in more because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: My pugs love them!
customer_reviews.text: My smaller pug used to have a tiny deep dish bed that she outgrew, but she insisted on still sitting in it. Then I noticed my much larger pug trying to fit in the tiny bed, but he wasn't as persistent as my small pug. So I just ordered one regular size and they couldn't even wait for me to take it out of the bag. They were both competing over who got to lay in the new bed. So the only solution was to buy another one, of course! I ordered the jumbo size for my big pug and as you can see......they are loving these beds! They are very soft/cozy too. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Not what you expect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these kitty beds and they are without a doubt the poorest quality at a high price that I have ever purchased on Amazon or anywhere else. The sides and back do not hold their form because they are "flimsy!" Cats get in and sides collapse! I've added and extra pad to the bottom from a previous worn out pair because the bedding is anything but plush. I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Vance

customer_reviews.title: Five paws!
customer_reviews.text: My little old man (11 years old, Boston terrier, 20 lbs.) loves his new bed. There's enough cushioning for his old bones. He can curl up with a bit of room to spare. The edges are flexible enough that he can stretch out when he wants to. He tends to be cold a lot, and this bed keeps him snuggled and warm. Normally he sleeps with us, but since we got this bed, he spends more nights there than with us.
customer_reviews.author: Alegrias

customer_reviews.title: Lenny doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality product, but the back sticks up way too far (farther than it looks in the photos). Since it's not supported by anything, it just flops over on itself when my cat tries to enter it or knead. He's tried several times and I keep trying to figure out placement that will keep everything upright, but there just isn't one. I've even tried propping up the front to prevent the back from folding over the bed, but not even that works. I give this a 5 for quality and a 1 for design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No toxic chemical smells!
customer_reviews.text: Read lots of reviews and decided to get this one... I was extremely happy to open it and have zero factory chemical smells. I ordered it weeks before I would need it for my kittens with the intention of off gassing it and/or having to launder it a few times but I am SO pleasantly surprised that it smells completely neutral. (And I have an insanely sensitive nose!) Thank you Best Friends by Sheri For making non-toxic pet beds. I will definitely be ordering another one of these when my kittens get larger and want their own!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stay up.
customer_reviews.text: I personally thought kitty would love this. I love it! If there was a human size, I'd be getting it! lol But, the main problem is it doesn't stay standing up. Kitty gets in & the top starts coming down. So she actually lays on top of it. But as we know, most kitties like their privacy. :-) I really like this thing. It's very, very soft. And very easy to clean. But if the "staying up" can be managed, it'd be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the older female stray kitty who joined our family. Have it set up with a blanket over top so she can burrow under. It's on the covered porch along with her little house. She refused to use it for the first few days until I put her in it. She immediately changed her mind and settled in. She sleeps so much better. We recently had snow here, and when she jumped out of her bed to meet me in the driveway she was nice and toasty warm. So it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and how soft it is. It does stay upright real well... I guess it'll take time to take the proper shape. The package sort of slushes it into a weird position. Kitten loves laying it as it is soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jimp

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bed for a demanding breed
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing literally dozens of other beds from various other places and being tired of their predictable destruction from my doxie, I can finally say that this product proved to be THE one. It is made of high quality materials, the design works as described and my doxie loves it! For the first time in 4 1/2 years my doxie sleeps belly up carelessly. The bed’s bowl-shaped design seems to provide the protective enclosure he needs to feel safe. As soon as I received the bed I gave it a complete cleaning cycle in my washer machine, dried it in low temperature an then introduced my doxie to it. He loves it! Recommend A+!!!
customer_reviews.author: Herminio A. Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Great cat bed cozy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cat bed I purchased that my cats refuse to use YIKES! for 2 years they used a $6.00 one I purchased in a discount store they loved it used it all the time but it got so that I could no longer clean it and tossed it out. I guess I need to go back and find one that is similar because at this point my second attempt to replace their bed was a bad as the first -- This is a great cat bed soft one very high side but it does kind of collapse when not in use I have to keep pushing the high side up --maybe that's the issue
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.  Chili loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and was very pleased that it was packed air tight. Upon opening it the air came out and it exploded into this big lush gorgeous soft and well-made kitty bed. It didn’t take my cat very long to realize this was the best place to be! The quality is exceptional and I have not washed it because I just received it but I can tell it’s going to last for years. An excellent purchase and my cat would say the same!
customer_reviews.author: Pepperoosky

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats
customer_reviews.text: My two cats like this bed. They use it as much as any other bed. One likes kneading it. Cleaning could be easier. The tag on the bed states you need to wash on cold, gentle. This doesn't quite get the bed clean. Drying on low heat didn't seem to damage the bed. I bought the oyster luxe bed first, then the black sherpa. The oyster bed was perfect, but the black sherpa had a few issues. It shed bits of black fabric, and not just in the dryer. It also has a tendency to curl up into a ball rather than lying flat like the oyster bed.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: My poms love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for my senior Pom who looks freakishly like the one pictured. He loves sleeping in a little ball with his head elevated and I thought this might be perfect for him and it was. He loves it! His sister likes it too. Planning to purchase a second bed for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Benji Approves!
customer_reviews.text: This is my little guy’s favorite dog bed—and by favorite, I mean the only one he will willingly sleep in. Like, if he had the option between a different dog bed and our loft’s cement floors, he’d choose the cement. Not anymore! He freaking loves this thing. He’ll sleep curled up in ball, sprawled over the side, however he pleases. We both highly recommend! (And honestly, it’s very aesthetically pleasing to look at!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Braun

customer_reviews.title: Dog tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: We had no trouble convincing our jack russell mix to sleep in this bed. I keep it by my computer desk and he's always right there, enjoying his cocoon. We got it in gray & cream, size small. Our dog is 17 lbs and it fits him perfectly. This product is dog tested and approved!
customer_reviews.author: S. Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed, but on the small side
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself looks very nice and unlike others, mine kept its shape well. From the pictures in the reviews I should have realized the bed was pretty small, but the description said it was for pets up to 24lbs so I thought it'd be ok for my 16lb dog. He barely fits in it.... I would return it but he loves it so I guess thats all that matters. Just be warned, I would not buy this if your dog is over 10lbs
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Kitty wouldn’t use, but I want a human version
customer_reviews.text: I was sad to return this. My kitten just wouldnt use it. The couple of instances she spent any time on it (only bc I put a treat on it), it tipped backwards when she was in it! :( This startled her a bit. I was surprised it was so unsturdy and floppy. I did try putting it against a wall but she still didn’t want to use it. However, it is soooo soft and fluffy!!! I seriously kept stepping on it and touching it. And the aqua color is absolutely beautiful and happens to match my decor. I almost kept it just in case, but didn’t want to waste the room.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Had to get a 2nd b/c it's so good my cats are fighting over the first one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the reviews were good, but also because the pets in all of the photos look so happy, especially the one of the white cat on the pink bed. I have 3 cats. I made a mistake and only ordered one. Two of my cats are fighting over who gets to sit in the bed so I came back here to order another. Hopefully it arrives just as quickly as the first one!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Farless

customer_reviews.title: Best bed for pets needing to feel safe.
customer_reviews.text: This is Chewees favorite bed. He's gone through MANY of them. Poor Chew was taken from his mom too early. As a result, he has some odd behaviors, including nursing. With this bed, he feels very safe and secure and he nurses on a section of the bed. He can easily carry it from room to room. I LOVE that the bed is machine washable!!! I'm not saying the bed is indestructible... We’re on his second one as nursing with teeth will equal holes. This is not the manufactures fault. I am so happy to have found a bed that Chew loves so much. I even have one on stand by- just in case : )
customer_reviews.author: GsMaMa613

product_meta.title: Best Friends by Sheri OrthoComfort Deep Dish Cuddler - Self-Warming Cat and Dog Bed Cushion for Joint-Relief and Improved Sleep - Machine Washable, Waterproof Bottom - for Pets Up to 25lbs
product_meta.description: Size:Standard Bed| Color:Gray LuxDESIGNED FOR ANIMALS, LOVED BY PET PARENTS! Cozy, warm and comfortable, a pet bed is a must-have for your four-legged friend. While many models promote better sleep, they become flat and uncomfortable the more your pet uses them. Whats worse, they hold odors and are impossible to clean. Show your pet some TLC with an OrthoComfort Deep Dish Cuddler from Best Friends by Sheri! Measuring 20L x 20W x 12H inches, it can easily accommodate animals up to 25lbs and provides the sense of security they need in order to sleep deeply. Dogs, cats and even rabbits will enjoy the self-warming Sherpa, mimicking the comfort of a mothers fur while promoting better sleep, health and behavior. Our innovative design features a 12 rear bolster, offering back support and easing joint tension! Paired with a curved 9 front, pets will enjoy additional head and neck support. With its flexible design, animals can sleep in any position. And because the bottom is WATERPROOF, your floors are kept safe. We even bar-stitch the walls, keeping the filling in place while washing! Pet-safe and non-toxic, we used only premium materials when creating these beds! With durable oxford fabric and virgin AirLOFT fiber filling, it wont attract dirt or dust for simple, hassle-free maintenance. WHY CHOOSE THE ORTHOCOMFORT DEEP DISH CUDDLER? - Promotes better sleep and health - Provides a sense of security - Flexible, warm and comfortable - Safe in the washer and dryer - Made with pet-safe materials Try Today Risk Free with Our Money Back ! *Stock is limited. Order today to ensure availability. Order Your Pet Bed Now for Long-Lasting Comfort!
feature_bullets: Age Range Description: All Life Stages
